Subskills.name: Calm And Collected
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of shadow step.

Subskills.name: Daggerstorms
Subskills.description: Additionally summons a storm of daggers from the sky on hit.

Subskills.name: Groundshaker
Subskills.description: Chance to stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Improved Lethality
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned enemies.

Subskills.name: Shadow Ally
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to summon shadow clones to mimic your shadow step on a nearby target.

Subskills.name: Stepping Stone
Subskills.description: Stunning an enemy with shadow step increases your damage & cast rate for a short period stacking up to eight times.

Subskills.name: Sonic Boom
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to deal damage additional times upon arrival.

Subskills.name: Pulsating Shadows
Subskills.description: Shadow step now pulsates additional times inflicting arcane break.

Subskills.name: Planned Out
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using shadow step.

Subskills.name: Speed Demon
Subskills.description: Increases area of effect radius for a portion of your bonus movement speed.

Subskills.name: Bargain With Demons
Subskills.description: When landing nearby corpses are consumed to unleash a shadow explosion dealing area of effect damage and inflict burning.

Subskills.name: Vortex Step
Subskills.description: Pull nearby monsters towards you unleashing bolts of shadow energy into all directions when landing dealing additional damage and stunning them.
